FROM t_company a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.company_name LIKE '%'||#{companyName}||'%' '%'+#{companyName}+'%' concat('%',#{companyName},'%')

AND a.bank_name LIKE '%'||#{bankName}||'%' '%'+#{bankName}+'%' concat('%',#{bankName},'%')
AND a.bank_account LIKE '%'||#{bankAccount}||'%' '%'+#{bankAccount}+'%' concat('%',#{bankAccount},'%')

ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.company_name AS "companyName", a.tell_phone AS "tellPhone", a.id_type AS "idType", a.id_no AS "idNo", a.company_adress AS "companyAdress", a.business_adress AS "businessAdress", a.bank_name AS "bankName", a.bank_account AS "bankAccount", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM t_company a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.id_type = #{idType} AND a.id_no = #{idNo}
